attributes.additional_details:
Don’t delay. A lot of people could die. 
Our economy left ages ago. If not now the time for all to put aside Politics & work for the National Interest then we will probably not (so I fear) be even a nation come 2021. 
PLM Votes alone will NOT save life. Ministers could all fall like flies. Unite now. Put aside Political Rhetoric, use all expertise. Save The Country. Be efficient. Both sides have smart ideas & working together in crisis is the only way to boost confidence; to prevent hysteria.
attributes.background:
It is time to put aside your politics & form a National Unity Government focussed solely on saving The People of Great Britain from the Pandemic gripping the world.

Defend GB from collapsing in on itself. Up-hold the National Peace. Steer HMS GB into port to fix up before the storm hits.
